collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (38 total Queries, 31 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.hover: This query was called more than once.

queries.sql: SELECT `products`.`discount`, `product_slug`, `products`.`id` as `id`, `title`, `desc`, `price`, `stock`, `image_name1`, `image_name2`, `image_name3`, `image_name4`, `small_image_name1`, `small_image_name2`, `small_image_name3`, `small_image_name4`, `order` FROM `products` JOIN `product_category` as `pc` ON `pc`.`product_id` = `products`.`id` JOIN `product_images` as `pi` ON `pi`.`product_id` = `products`.`id` LEFT JOIN `product_filters` ON `product_filters`.`product_id` = `products`.`id` WHERE `category_id` IN ('1','4','5','6') AND `visibility` = '1' AND `is_deleted` = '0' AND filter_name = "colour" AND filter_value = "black" OR filter_name = "size" AND filter_value = "small" AND `price` <= '0' GROUP BY `id` LIMIT 25

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `products`.`discount`, `product_slug`, `products`.`id` as `id`, `title`, `desc`, `price`, `stock`, `image_name1`, `image_name2`, `image_name3`, `image_name4`, `small_image_name1`, `small_image_name2`, `small_image_name3`, `small_image_name4`, `order` FROM `products` JOIN `product_category` as `pc` ON `pc`.`product_id` = `products`.`id` JOIN `product_images` as `pi` ON `pi`.`product_id` = `products`.`id` LEFT JOIN `product_filters` ON `product_filters`.`product_id` = `products`.`id` WHERE `category_id` IN ('1','4','5','6') AND `visibility` = '1' AND `is_deleted` = '0' AND filter_name = "colour" AND filter_value = "black" OR filter_name = "size" AND filter_value = "small" AND `price` <= '0' GROUP BY `id` LIMIT 25
